description: Try our easy to follow BBQ Nutella Pizza recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: BBQ Nutella Pizza Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place a pizza stone on a covered barbecue chargrill, close hood and preheat on high heat for 15 minutes.
Place pizza base on preheated stone and cook until it starts to colour, flip pizza base and repeat the process.
Spread chocolate spread over pizza base to completely cover. Sprinkle over ricotta, pistachio and marshmallow.
Close the barbecue hood and cook for 2-5 minutes. Once marshmallow has melted and slightly blackened, transfer to a cutting board.
Top with strawberry and dust with icing sugar. Cut pizza and serve.
